Reviews.Title: Great Camera Bundle for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Mahipal Biswas
Reviews.Content: I have nothing new to say about Nikon D7100 body that's already not being said. I am writing this review is for this bundle. This is a great bundle for a beginner. This is my first DSLR and this bundle includes all the stuffs that I need. Buying this accessories separately would cost you much more than this bundle price.If you are a beginner (like me) it will take some time to get used to all the camera controls, buttons, menus. But, once you learn its easy after that.Though, I did not like the tripod that came with this bundle. If you want a solid and steady tripod buy it separately.
